QuestData.Title: A Proper Parting
QuestData.Description: The ogres outnumbered us, *cough* but we made them pay for their deeds in blood.$b$bEven so, I was forced to abandon my fallen brothers and sisters on the battlefield. They deserve better than to have their corpses despoiled by the ogre filth.$b$bHere, take this torch *cough* and do what I could not: burn the corpses of my fallen brothers and sisters to the west.
QuestData.LogDescription: Burn the corpses of dead Frostwolf Outriders.
QuestData.RewardText: You bring honor to the clan by giving my family a proper burial, $n.
